content: biscuit the duck free crochet pattern ** no sew ** spooky variants available on etsy/jainascrochetcorner1 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved supplies yarn weight 6 plush i used hobbii honey bunny in hunter green green white white chocolate brown and lemon curd yellow 5 0 mm crochet hook - for the weight 6 yarn safety eyes 16mm stitch markers yarn needle * for the invisible decrease scissors insert your hook into the front stuffing material - i used polyfil loop only of the next two stitches yarn over and pull abbreviations through those two stitches us crochet terms yarn over and pull through the remaining two loops on mc - magic_ring your hook single_crochet - single_crochet increase - two single_crochet in one stitch ** for the 5dcdec you should 3scinc - 3sc in one stitch yo insert hook into the first 5dcinc - 5 double crochets in one stitch stitch yo and pull through yo decrease - invisible decrease* and pull through 2 loops 2 5dcdec - decreasing 5 stitches to one loops should be on your hook using double crochets** still repeat this for the next slip_stitch - slip_stitch 4 stitches you should have 6 chain - chain loops on your hook yo and yo - yarn over pull through all 6 blo - back loop only notes this pattern was worked using yarn under then yarn over stitches yu/yo size may change depending on how stitches are worked this pattern is worked in continuous rounds don t join any of your rounds with a slip_stitch and chain unless otherwise noted use a stitch marker to mark the beginnings of your rounds to help keep track of them you can use a different weight of yarn but make sure to adjust your hook size to match size of final product may change finished size is approximately 5 5 inches 14 cm tall and 5 inches 12 cm long 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved wings x2 5 0mm hook and weight 6 plush yarn brown 1 mc - 6sc 6 2 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x2 8 3 single_crochet around 8 4 *single_crochet increase 2sc* x2 10 5 *single_crochet 2inc 2sc* x2 14 6 single_crochet around 14 7 *single_crochet 2dec 2sc* x2 10 8 *2dec single_crochet* x2 6 --> fasten_off do not stuff weave or tuck the end into the wing beak 5 0mm hook and weight 6 plush yarn yellow 1 ch5 2 starting in 2nd chain from hook - 3sc 3scinc working in the other side of the chain - 2sc increase 10 3 -4 single_crochet around 10 - 2 row --> fasten_off do not stuff weave or tuck the end into the beak 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved body 5 0mm hook and weight 6 plush yarn green white and brown working with green yarn 1 mc - 8sc 8 2 *single_crochet increase* x4 12 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x6 24 5 -7 single_crochet around
